pros: The team are very welcoming and you get thrown right in with learning how to use equipment. If ever you're unsure of something just ask and help is provided. You pick up loads of new skills.

job_title: Retail and Admissions in London, England
cons: The only con I have is the fact that I never got a contract working there full-time. I have worked there regularly as an agency staff but it was difficult to get an interview for the same position I was doing as an agency. In the end I gave up, at least for now, but it was an amazing place and I felt welcomed.

job_title: Events Assistant in Forest Hill, England
pros: Great, friendly team, Great facilities and the food there is amazing!
cons: It's up a big hill and it's pretty hard to get a permanent job there.
